Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the impact of "ridiculous liberal (Democrat) laws like Catch & Release" on preventing border patrol agents from doing their job at the border.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to back up the assertion that liberal laws are the main reason for border patrol agents not being able to do their job properly.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the "liberal (Democrat) laws like Catch & Release" are the only factor hindering border patrol agents, without considering other potential reasons or factors.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim fails to acknowledge alternative explanations for the challenges faced by border patrol agents, such as the backlog of court cases and shortage of space at immigration detention centers.
